T02D3481:130a-1: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na s'a dha nam /
T02D3481:130a-3: gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs //
T02D3481:130a-4: bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo ba la phyag 'chal lo //
T02D3481:130a-5: yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs 'ga' zhig tu stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3481:130a-6: rang gi snying gar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng
T02D3481:130a-7: du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um yig nag po
T02D3481:130a-8: bsam par bya'o // de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i phyogs bla ma dang /
T02D3481:130a-11: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gtum po chen po gdan drangs nas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D3481:130a-13: mi byed par sdom pa dang /
T02D3481:130a-14: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3481:130a-15: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang ;
T02D3481:130a-17: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3481:130a-21: btang snyoms te tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par byas nas /
T02D3481:130a-22: 'gro ba 'di rnams rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo
T02D3481:130b-0: nyid gzung ba @130b dang 'dzin pa las nges par
T02D3481:130b-1: grol ba rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang chu bur
T02D3481:130b-2: ltar stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3481:130b-3: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3481:130b-4: de'i rjes su dri ma med pa'i nam mkha'i phyogs
T02D3481:130b-5: su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du nyi ma'i
T02D3481:130b-6: dkyil 'khor la h'um yig nag po las skyes pa'i
T02D3481:130b-7: ral gri'i chang par h'um yig go //
T02D3481:130b-8: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshogs thams
T02D3481:130b-9: cad gdan drangs nas h'um gi yi ge la rab
T02D3481:130b-11: de nas h'um yig las byung ba'i me bskal ba'i
T02D3481:130b-12: me lta bur 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pas gdug
T02D3481:130b-14: sprin nag chen po lta bu'i sku mdog can /
T02D3481:130b-15: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02D3481:130b-16: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3481:130b-17: gzhon nu zur phud lnga 'phro ba /
T02D3481:130b-18: kunda bzhin du zhal gtsigs shing ya sos ma mchu bsdams pa /
T02D3481:130b-19: gdug pa can skrag par 'jigs su rung ba'i sku la brten pa /
T02D3481:130b-20: khro gnyer bsdus pas rab tu 'jigs shing spyan gnyis zur mig tu blta ba /
T02D3481:130b-21: zhabs kyi pus mo g-yas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la btsugs pa /
T02D3481:130b-22: chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i steng du zhabs g-yon pa 'degs par 'dod pa /
T02D3481:130b-23: phyag g-yas na h'um yig gi chang pa nas 'bar bzhin pa'i ral gri nag po /
T02D3481:130b-24: g-yon pa'i khu tshur sdigs mdzub kyis dpag tu med par 'khrugs pa'i khyab 'jug dang /
T02D3481:130b-26: tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams la bsdigs shing nyon
T02D3481:130b-27: mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'ching pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D3481:130b-28: gser gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3481:130b-29: 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa phun sum
T02D3481:130b-30: tshogs pa'i dga' ba ster bas gcig tu 'bar ba'i
T02D3481:130b-31: dpal ldan gtum po chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3481:130b-32: bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po mi
T02D3481:130b-33: g-yo ba'i thugs kar padma dang nyi ma la gnas
T02D3481:130b-34: pa'i h'um yig las byung ba'i chang pa h'um gis
T02D3481:130b-35: mtshan pa'i ral gri yongs su gyur pa las h'um
T02D3481:130b-36: yig las skyes pa'i gtum po chen po gnyis pa
T02D3481:130b-37: thugs kar bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya'o
T02D3481:130b-38: // de'i yang thugs ka'i padma dang nyi ma la
T02D3481:130b-39: gnas pa'i h'um yig nag po las drang por skyes
T02D3481:130b-40: // pa / de'i ral gri'i yu ba h'um yig gis mtshan pa /
T02D3481:131a-1: 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dam
T02D3481:131a-2: tshig sems dpa' dang 'dra bar bltas nas dza:yig gis
T02D3481:131a-3: dgug cing / zhal bsil dang bsang gtor la sogs
T02D3481:131a-4: pas phyogs su byon nas h'um yig gis de la
T02D3481:131a-5: de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3481:131a-6: bam yig gis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D3481:131a-7: ho:yig gis mnyes par bya ste /
T02D3481:131a-8: 'o ma dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du ro gcig tu gyur pa'i gtso bo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3481:131a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan dag dang /
T02D3481:131a-11: shangs kyi bu ga dag dang /
T02D3481:131a-14: thugs rnams su ji ltar sbyor pa'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3481:131a-20: yan lag drug rnams la dgod par bya'o //
T02D3481:131a-21: thugs kar gnas pa'i h'um yig las byung ba'i 'od
T02D3481:131a-22: zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang lha mo'i
T02D3481:131a-23: tshogs rnams bkug nas bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum
T02D3481:131a-24: pas khrus bya zhing mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'o
T02D3481:131a-25: // lha mo rnams kyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gar dang /
T02D3481:131a-26: rol mo la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa la sogs pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D3481:131a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan don la brtson pas sems can thams cad la 'dod chags dang /
T02D3481:131a-29: gti mug la sogs pa khyab 'jug dang /
T02D3481:131a-32: 'dod lha la sogs pa rnams kyi gti mug chen po'i dra ba dang /
T02D3481:131a-33: zhe sdang chen po'i dra ba dang /
T02D3481:131a-34: 'dod chags chen po'i dra ba rnams kyi ma rig
T02D3481:131a-35: pa'i mun pas srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams pa de
T02D3481:131a-37: de nas snying ga'i sngags las 'phros pa'i khro bo'i
T02D3481:131a-38: rgyal po chen po dpag tu med pas bdud kyi
T02D3481:131a-39: dpung gi tshogs rnams gcer bu skra grol ba du
T02D3481:131a-40: bzhin pa skyabs med pa rnams la rdo rje'i zhags
T02D3481:131a-41: pas bcings shing ral gri rnon pos dum bur gtubs
T02D3481:131a-42: shing bcad nas slar yang byams pa'i sems kyis dri
T02D3481:131a-43: ma med pa'i chos la bcug nas rang gi go
T02D3481:131a-45: bsam gtan gyis skyo na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3481:131a-46: thugs ka dang smin ma'i bar du mnyam du gnas
T02D3481:131a-47: pas sna tshogs de bzhin nyid gcig tu gyur pa'i
T02D3481:131b-0: sku mgon @131b po gtum po chen po'i sngags bzlas
T02D3481:131b-1: pa tsam gyis gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba dang
T02D3481:131b-2: / dul ba rnams dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D3481:131b-8: de bzhin du bskrad pa dang /
T02D3481:131b-11: skrag pa'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3481:131b-12: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
